# Time:  O(n)
# Space: O(1)

# Definition for singly-linked list.
# class ListNode(object):
#     def __init__(self, x):
#         self.val = x
#         self.next = None

# Two pointers solution.
class Solution(object):
    def plusOne(self, head):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        if not head:
            return None

        dummy = ListNode(0)
        dummy.next = head

        left, right = dummy, head
        while right.next:
            if right.val != 9:
                left = right
            right = right.next

        if right.val != 9:
            right.val += 1
        else:
            left.val += 1
            right = left.next
            while right:
                right.val = 0
                right = right.next

        return dummy if dummy.val else dummy.next


# Time:  O(n)
# Space: O(1)
class Solution2(object):
    def plusOne(self, head):
        """
        :type head: ListNode
        :rtype: ListNode
        """
        def reverseList(head):
            dummy = ListNode(0)
            curr = head
            while curr:
                dummy.next, curr.next, curr = curr, dummy.next, curr.next
            return dummy.next

        rev_head = reverseList(head)
        curr, carry = rev_head, 1
        while curr and carry:
            curr.val += carry
            carry = curr.val / 10
            curr.val %= 10
            if carry and curr.next is None:
                curr.next = ListNode(0)
            curr = curr.next

        return reverseList(rev_head)
